name: TrailG
description:
TrailG Game Puzzle Platformer

 Rotate platform to play the game. Glitch through the platform, make the ball rolling to the finish line!

2 Level Available

Control:
W & D = Rotate Right
S & A = Rotate Left
R = Reset
Esc = Main Menu

Music : 

The World That Awaits Us -https://www.freesoundtrackmusic.com/music_listing_enricoaltavilla.html
